Wizard Arcane School

Metal represents firmness, rigidity, persistence, strength, determination, and electricity. It is commonly represented by gold and silver as its purest forms, though lower magic relating to iron and steel is part of the metal school.

Metal Elementalist Wizard Spells

0 - mending

1st - body capacitance, gravity bow, magic weapon, mirror polish, reinforce armaments, shock shield, shocking grasp

2nd - aggressive thundercloud, bullet shield, bullet ward, defensive shock, glitterdust, make whole, shatter, silk to steel, warding weapon

3rd - chill metal, heat metal, keen edge, lightning bolt, magic weapon, greater, pellet blast, silver darts, versatile weapon

4th - aggressive thundercloud, greater, malfunction, named bullet, shout, stoneskin

5th - lightning arc, major creation, rapid repair, rusting grasp, soothe construct, unbreakable construct, wreath of blades

6th - chain lightning, disintegrate, named bullet, greater, wall of iron

7th - arcane cannon, awaken construct, control construct, statue

8th - call construct, iron body, shout, greater, stormbolts

9th - meteor swarm, repel metal or stone, ride the lightning
